User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow crawling of admin or private areas (if any in future)
# Disallow: /admin/
# Disallow: /private/

# Allow crawling of all public content
Allow: /gallery
Allow: /furniture
Allow: /privacy
Allow: /refunds
Allow: /tos

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://jewelryai.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
